templates.template: <form class="approve_form" action="%FORM_URL%" method="post"> <input type="hidden" name="user_id" value="%USER_ID%"></input> <input type="hidden" name="entity_id" value="%ENTITY_ID%"></input> <input type="submit" name="action" value="Approve"></input> </form>

<form class="unapprove_form" action="%FORM_URL%" method="post"> <input type="hidden" name="user_id" value="%USER_ID%"></input> <input type="hidden" name="entity_id" value="%ENTITY_ID%"></input> <input type="submit" name="action" value="Unapprove"></input> </form>

<form class="reject_form" action="%FORM_URL%" method="post"> <input type="hidden" name="user_id" value="%USER_ID%"></input> <input type="hidden" name="entity_id" value="%ENTITY_ID%"></input> <input type="submit" name="action" value="Reject"></input> </form>

<form class="edit_form" action="%FORM_URL%" method="post"> <input type="hidden" name="user_id" value="%USER_ID%"></input> <input type="hidden" name="entity_id" value="%ENTITY_ID%"></input> <input type="submit" name="action" value="Edit"></input> </form>

<form class="remove_form" action="%FORM_URL%" method="post"> <input type="hidden" name="user_id" value="%USER_ID%"></input> <input type="hidden" name="entity_id" value="%ENTITY_ID%"></input> <input type="submit" name="action" value="Remove"></input> </form>
